tag_list: greg, bobolo, sendtonews, video, digital-media, video-solution, sports-media, media, online-media, ceo
overview:
Greg Bobolo is CEO of canadian based technology company SendtoNews.com

SendtoNews is a digital news agency syndicating premium sports video highlights connecting sports leagues, news outlets & leading brands. SendtoNews.com is reshaping the news industry to scale and prosper in the web 2.0 world. They enable content creators to distribute video content more efficiently to newsrooms providing lucrative new revenue streams to traditional newspaper.com’s, broadcast and pure digital news agencies.

SendtoNews has two sports networks, the (PSN) Pro Sports Network and the (MPSN) Minor Pro Sports Network. SendtoNews actively acquires rights for both networks and distributes this content to its thousands of broadcast, Digital and newspaper.com’s in its news partnership network (NPN)

Greg spends his time between the SendtoNews west coast operations (San Francisco, Victoria & Vancouver) and their office in Manhattan, New York.
